consejo: agreguen la posibilidad de unirse a partidas con grupo!
Muy bueno

Me gusta bastante este juego, pero sinceramente el sistema de grupo que tiene es pésimo, muy muy malo. Tiene muchas vueltas para poder hacer el grupo, despues mandar la partida y luego como si eso no fuera poco, todos los host tienen lag, porque este juego no tiene servidores dedicados, entonces el lag en la mayoria de los casos hace la partida inviable. 
Realmente una lastima, porque es una buena idea pero mas desarrollada.

Sigo con mi voto negativo.

Exciting Unique Thriller

This game attracted me because of the unique gameplay. Being a survivor of a horror-movie esq killer instantly captured my attention. Then, I found out you can become the killer himself. You'll get a thrill of the chase as the killer chases you with the classic movie music playing faster and faster as the killer nears. Great little skill-checks during completing objects, and teamwork to survive adds more excitement. Even though I found it easier to throw the other survivors to killer I found it more challenging to help.

I find that it gets rather repeatitive the more you play the game. The maps aren't too different from eachother, and the tasks to escape the killer is the same. Hopefully, their will be new objectives in the future.
9 фпс из 10
bad game! so many bugs!

This game is not worth buying. Its terrible, sure they have good ideas, but they clearly released the game way too early. Theres nothing but bugs and glitches. You cant do simple things like invite your friend to lobby party. Its restricted to private. I only just bought the game yesterday and i've spent more time trying to get the game to work and actually connect me to a match than playing the game. Youre practically paying money to be told to wait and then told that there was an error and try again. DO NOT BUY IT

My Dead By Daylight Experience

- Starts up the game
- Gets invited by friends to play
- Spawns infront of killer
- Runs for life
- Bumps into friend
- Both start to run
- Killer injured friend
- Finds Trapdoor
- Killer hangs friend
- Waits for friend to die
- Listens to friend screaming for help in Skype call
- Ignores Screaming
- Friend gets sacrificed to the spider gods
- Trap door opens
- Get caught going in
- Wiggle Wiggle Wiggle
- Wiggles free
- Jumps in trap door
- Escapes
- Listens to butt hurt friend
- Starts game over

10/10 would leave friend again

The game has potential to be fun, but it's not worth it yet. Not even on sale.

Once you factor all of the glitches that make the game seem like it's still in beta, the inability to party up with your friends, the uselessness of the majority of items in the game, a matchmaking system that doesn't make any sense, a lack of customization...you'd find it hard to justify buying it. And then you realize that the concept of balancing the game hasn't even been talked about, and all you have to do is look at the Steam Discussions to see that the game is not in a good place at all; and the community is all over the place on what could fix it.

It's a barebones game that sounds great, but fails to follow through on literally anything besides disappointment. Either wait for the game get to a better place, or save your money for Friday the 13th.

I just refunded this, because instead of adding multiplayer with friends, you add penalisations to leaving lobbys, the only reason this happened is because we wanted to play with our friends.

Ich habe mittlerweile ein paar Stündchen gespielt und es verliert nicht seinen Reiz. Ich liebe die Atmosphäre, den Sound und die Gestaltung der Charaktere. Hinter diesem Spiel steckt so viel Liebe im Detail, das erkennt man schon im Spiemenü. Ich habe zuvor noch nie ein Spiel dieser Art gespielt und bin absolut begeistert. Selbst nach 500 Stunden hat das Game Neues zu bieten, da jedes Match anders ist. Klar gibt es ein paar Bugs/Balancing Probleme in dem Game, doch die Devs kümmern sich ständig darum. 

Eine Sache möchte ich noch loswerden:

An alle Personen die das Game 2 Stunden spielen und danach eine Rewiev verfassen: Lasst es einfach sein. Ihr wisst wie es funktioniert und wollt es bewerten? Ja klar sind alle anderen Anfangs OP, weil ihr einfach schlecht seid. Und das dürft ihr auch, weil ihr neu in dem Game seid und noch nicht wisst wie einzelne Mechaniken funktionieren. Doch bitte bewertet deshalb ein Game nicht einfach mit einer schlechten Note, nur weil ihr frustriert seid, weil ein Match mal nicht so gut gelaufen ist.


Fazit: Dieses Spiel ist einfach großartig! Für den Preis lohnt es sich auf alle Fälle das Game zu kaufen.

The most vocal of the players in this game are the critics.  You've paid for it, don't play it if you don't want to.  Across the fan feedback forums the developers are working to calm worries that they aren't listening and have already begun to patch this one up.  
     Was it released to early, most certainly.  There is potential here for an even better experience than this expertely crafted and, most importantly, fun game already provides. I have no idea what you say to relate to young gamers, I'm a 31 year old man who owns 11 games. I picked up  on 'Git Gud', which should maybe have an umlaut, and those people aren't completely wrong.  There's a learning curve that seems to be causing the most bitching.  Figure it out for yourself.  This game is most certainly worth it, even in it's most current form.

Dead By Daylight is a game that I have really enjoyed. But, there are some things in this game that ruins the fun of the game. My friends and I agree that this game has potential to be an amazing game, and it has an amazing concept, but there are a few things in the game that I feel like every player can agree need to be changed.
1. There are far to many hooks in the maps. a lot of the time after getting downed or caught by the killer, there most likely is a hook within a few feet of where you died. This makes it far to easy for the killer to win.
2. Broken game Machanics. Yes, I am aware that the devs are fixing this, but sometimes you could be just about to vault over a wall and you are over it, but the killer still grabs you because your feet werent on the ground. that is a little broken.
3. The killer is to OP. Like in my last notes, they all point to the killer being too strong. this can be fixed by having less hooks and fixing gamebreaking glitches.
All in all, this game has a vast amount of potential to be an amazing game and i understand that it is still brand new, but still, some of the mechanics and updates seem to benefit the hunter, not the survivor.

Es entretenido, pero realmente la comunidad tan toxica, te puede ir arruinando el juego, lo mejor es intentar ignorarlos.
Y para nuevos jugadores pues lo mejor desde un principio ir poniendo ya sea en privado o solo en amigo que comenten sus perfiles, ya que es comun que los toxicos te comenten.
Y tras pasar eso lo mas seguro es que las primeras partidas sea muy comun morir, por lo que pues no te sientes tan mal, lo mejor es intentar ir agarrandole la practica a jugar contra los asesinos, aunque a unos nos cueste mas que otros, eso no quita el echo de que pueda seguir ocurriendo ya en rangos altos tras mucha experiencia.

Realmente les recomiendo jugar mejor identityV donde esta mejor pensado y es mucho menos tóxico.

Dieses Spiel als Release-Titel zum entsprechenden Preis zu veröffentlichen ist blanker Hohn. Das ganze ist ein Bugfest erster Güte. Das geht soweit, dass man dazu verbannt wird festgebuggt zuzuschauen, während die Survivors die Generatoren anschalten, während man selbst keinen Finger rühren darf. Das Spiel verlassen ist auch schwer ohne Cursor und wird dann auch noch bestraft. Bravo, behaviour. Dieses Stück Schund-Software solltet ihr vielleicht erstmal gründlich fixen, bevor ihr an irgendwelche neuen Features denkt.

tl;dr: Typische "Early Access" Symptome. Bugs ohne Ende. Finger weg.

I love the concept of this game, and by what I've seen it's one of the best Survival Horror games of 2016. However, when I bought the game I quickly realised that I cannot play it on a Mac Computer (Which really sucks).
In the future if this game could be available to play on Mac computers that would be amazing.
I've tried to play it on a PC, but it shutdown my computer and its lagging like crazy.
I recommend this game for people with a good running PC.

Great idea for a game, great graphics great sound, BUT.... just like every other time of game where you have to play a game where you must do this or do that and 1 player is the bad guy they camp. What i mean by capming is in this game killers will track players trying to do something and they hit/hurt you grab you stick you on a hook chain and stand there and wait till you die now i understand that this is kind of the point but at the same time once you are caught your done game over rinse and repeat. So yes i understand i must get a lot better at this game but at the same point less then 10% chance that survivers will win, only way i can see survivers winning a game is if there is a really bad killer (which i play a really bad killer lol. Again great idead just seems pointless after a few games!! But i will keep trying and see if it gets better.

PERFECT
Ive had a great time playing this game.
Klasse spiel, horror effekt ist gegeben nur die buggs stören auf dauer, sollten mal gefixed werden kommen, aber auch dauernd updates raus, aufjeden fall zu empfehlen wenn es endlich komplett ist.

EDIT: Fuck this game every second killer and survivor just wants to be toxic and takes all the fun out of it (yeah there are nice people out there but the insulting and trolling ones ruin it in the game afterwards). Also rare addons and some perks are sometimes so broken that you will just die when you don't know about them (wraith has a bell and is slow - oh with this addon he isn't, huntress needs to hit you twice - oh with this addon she doesn't, zombies are slow - oh with this addon they are fast -.-). Also hook camping and slugging happened the last 5 games I played so I can only recommend how fun it is to play the game as survivor purple rank and up by always doing only gens without being hunted and then 2 survivors escape (guess i just need the BT and Unbreakable perk instead of actually having fun with the other 100 ones). Much fun and thanks for the devs for enabling this shitty gameplay where nobody has fun and two survivors probably even derank/do not even get blood points at the end of the match - and every time if someone tried to save a hooked camped person the killer got a 3K or 4K which means it totally works (at least for the killer).

Also I hope that everyone that was toxic to me without any reason than just me losing because I am "worse" than them is proud of themselves and had fun doing this (and thanks to the developer for not banning or timing out a single person that ever did this to me - i am pretty sure they have not banned a single player since why ban people who give them money).

TLDR: I would recommend this game if you have a friend group (probably with already someone being very good at the game) since the idea behind the game can be really fun, especially when you have fun playing with them (teamwork and communication in this game is really good). You also have fun watching 15+ hours of guides showing you how to utilize all the addons, perks and characters and how to counter/play every killer.

But if you don't want to watch hours of guides and don't have a friend group and think you can just solo queue your way to the top playing at different stages of your skill against people around your skill then you probably are better off never even playing the game. 

Matchmaking is shit since 2016 if you solo queue (even as killers) as long as you are not good enough to reach purple rank - the devs don't care and everybody that reached red rank says the matchmaking is fine just get better by outplaying these good players ("I mean just get good even though i never need to play against players much better than me").
SWF (survivors that play in a group) also get just free games when they have at least two good players since they just rank against group average or long waiting low rank killers.
Best thing is red ranks reset every month back to purple so sometimes you just go against super good players that are "only" purple - many killers still derank on purpose all the time (i know this because i play also survivor and because i watch DbD streams on Twitch where this shit happens at least every 5th game).

It's a shame that seemingly no one in this community or the developers want to improve anything about the matchmaking which is why as a newbie or not yet good player without any good friends you will just go against super good players (killers and survivors) all the time instead of people around your rank so you can actually have fun while improving from time to time.

Also be prepared to spend much money on DLCs alone since Perks, survivors and killers which are essential in this game can sometimes only be bought or in some cases can be gotten after putting 100 of hours into the game.

It's just frustrating to play the game since for example as a rank 13 killer in my last 10 games I got 2 lobbies where the people were so dumb that I could have easily gotten a 4K (but like why shit on dumb/new players that even die on the hook because they get not saved or miss the checks  - that is not my style), 3 lobbies where it was a hard fight and I got one or two dead people out of it or lost some hooks because I made rookie mistakes and the other 5 where I was utterly destroyed by super good survivors without getting more than 3 hooks the whole game.
It would be fucking good idea to just not put survivors that were red ranks or are red ranks in the last months against killers who did not even reach purple ranks but that shit is beyond me (like rank 3 to rank 13 has a difference of 10 ranks but the game still thinks that I have a chance outsmarting these players).

Next to that you get a nice community that sometimes shits on you when you are bad (red/purple rank survivor to green/yellow rank survivor/killer: "you are so bad" - low rank: "i know" - high rank: "uninstall the game retard") and then there is facecamping, tunneling, flashlight clicking, teabagging (which are all techniques encouraged to do by the developers <3) and balanced killers like nurse, shape, spirit, wraith etc. (I know they "can" be outplayed but have you ever heard of addons or noed/make-my-choice/...?)

Also the queue times are fucked and there is neither transparency nor information about how many people are queuing with you or how many survivors/killers at your rank are currently also searching for a match.
Sometimes you get insta queues, sometimes you need to wait 10, sometimes 30 minutes until you get a lobby.

[h1]То, что доктор прописал![/h1]
Данная игра не оставит в стороне любителей фильмов из разряда "Техасская резня бензопилой" или "Поворот не туда", в ней есть всё чтобы пощикатать себе нервы играя за прототипов главных героев перечисленных выше кинолент, а для неординарных личностей имеющих психические расстройства имеется возможность отыгрывать роль живодёра,маньяка,убийцы (кому как нравится), стать тем кого мы боялись в далёких 90-2000-ых годах, после того как отёц приносил кассету из видеопроката с очередным фильмом ужасов. 

Первый раз играя на злодея я был потрясён насколько близка мне может быть данная роль, эти минуты вызывали фурор, неконтролируемые приступы смеха в погоне за раненным человеком, именно эта игра раскроет твою тёмную сущность :)

Конечно, восхищение угасает, когда проходит день,один,другой и всё становиться приевшимся, однообразным и требующее внедрения чего-то нового ,чтобы снова испытать те незабываемые чувства первой игры.

#뉴비와 고인물을 매칭시키는 정신나간 매칭시스템.
#일부 살인마는 하고싶지 않을만큼 쓰레기로 만드는 정신나간 킬러밸런스.
#대다수 퍽들은 너무 구려서 자리만 차지하는 쓰레기같은 정신나간 퍽밸런스.
#발전기만 빠르게 돌리면 몇분만에 게임이 터져버리는 생존자(특히 다인큐)와 살인마간의 압도적인 불균형의 정신나간 생존자VS살인마 밸런스.
#수많은 유저들이 셀 수 없을 만큼 피드백을 줬지만 모두 묵인하고 제멋대로 패치하는 개발진.
#이 모든 것들을 '진심으로 정상적인 밸런스'라고 생각하며 게임을 점점 망가뜨리는 패치를 하는 개발진.
=이제는 정말 거를 타선이 없어져 버렸습니다. 그래도 이 게임 하고싶으세요? 친구4명 모아서 다인큐하던지, 친구죽이기만 하세요. 그게 유일한 이 게임을 제대로 즐기는방법입니다.
현재 데바데는 제 방식대로 표현하자면 어느 돈많은 졸부의 아들내미가 취미로 게임 개발해보겠답시고 돈 쏟아부어서 그래픽만 그럴듯하게 만들고 밸런스는 지 꼴리는대로 덕지덕지 주먹구구식으로 만든 게임. 딱 그정도 수준입니다.
p.s 아 그리고 혹자는 매튜(데바데 총괄디렉터)가 싸잡아서 욕먹는다고, 매튜는 얼굴마담일 뿐이지 아무잘못이 없다고, 밸런스가 잘못됐으면 밸런스팀이 잘못한거고, 패치방향이 잘못된거면 해당 부서가 잘못한거다라고 하는데, 말같지도 않은 소리입니다. '총괄'디렉터라는 것 자체가 '하나의 게임이라는 것을 이루는 거의 모든 것에 관여'하며, 특히 게임 내 전반에 걸쳐 전체적인 방향성이나, 각 부서들의 계획들을 '승인'할지, '폐기'할지, '보류'할지를 '결정'하는 막대한 권력이 있는 자리입니다.
물론 이런 상황에 편승해서 옆에서 욕하니까 아무것도 모르고 따라 욕하는 것은 잘못된 행동이겠지만, 총괄디렉터는 얼굴마담일 뿐이고, 책임에 비해 너무 많이 욕을 먹는다? 그런 말을 하는 사람 거르십시오. 권력만능주의 정신병자일 확률이 큽니다.
---------------
스텔스 플레이와 추격전 그리고 심리전이 주요 포인트이고 대기방을 거쳐 게임을 시작하면 채팅불가이기 때문에 각자의 판단이 중요한데 이것 또한 이 게임만이 가지는 매력입니다. 어느 게임이나 그렇듯 게임 전반의 이해도,피지컬,순발력 등이 필요한데 데바데는 상황판단과 시간계산의 중요도가 특히나 높습니다.
 예를들어 생존자를 플레이시 1픽이 갈고리에 걸리는 중이라면 구하러 갈 것인지, 발전기를 돌릴 것인지, 캐비넷에 들어가 바칠각을 피할 것인지 등을 잘 판단하여 행동해야 하고, 그 행동을 어느 타이밍에 해야 가장 적절할지 시간을 잘 계산해야 합니다. 아까의 예시를 이어서 1픽을 구하러 갈 것이라면 갈고리 게이지가 잠식으로 넘어가기 전에 살인마에게 들키더라도 지금 당장 일직선으로 달려가 구할 것인지, 갈고리 근처에서 스텔스하며 천천히 접근 후 간보다가 구할 것인지 등을 또다시 판단해야하며,이 와중에 내가 갈고리까지 달려간다면 걸리는 시간과 갈고리 잠식까지의 시간 등을 잘 계산해야 합니다. 만약 스텔스하며 구출각을 간보는 판단을 했는데 살인마가 저 멀리서 로밍을 갔다가 갈고리로 돌아오고 있는 중이라면, 들키더라도 살인마가 완전히 갈고리에 돌아오기전에 재빨리 구할 것인지, 살인마가 갈고리로 돌아온다음 다시 로밍을 가려고 할 때 구할 것인지 또한 잘 판단해야 합니다.
 이 모든 순간의 상황판단들이 쌓이고 쌓여서 몇명이 생존할 수 있을지 판가름나고, 플레이중에 채팅이나 음성대화 시스템이 없기때문에 각자 스스로 판단해야한다는 것이 묘미입니다.
이 와중에 각자의 생존자는 협력하여 최대한 많은 인원이 탈출 할 수 있도록 자신을 희생하는 용기있는 플레이를 하거나, 혹은 배신하여 혼자만 생존할 수도 있습니다.
가끔 잘하는 생존자들을 만나면 서로 채팅하나 없지만 마치 텔레파시가 통하듯 적재적소의 타이밍에 올바른 상황판단으로 스스로를 희생하며 서로가 서로를 구하면서 살인마를 압도하는 플레이를 하기도 하는데 이런 플레이들은 데바데만이 가지는 특별한 매력이라고 생각합니다.
 그러나 현시점에서는 그러한 각자의 상황판단 실력으로 플레이하는 경우는 드물고 대부분 다인큐로 플레이합니다. 다인큐 패널티는 전혀 없으며, 보통 음성채팅 프로그램을 사용하여 살인마,발전기,생존자,아이템의 위치 등 정보를 실시간으로 전부 공유하기 때문에 앞서 말한 각자 스스로의 상황판단을 할 필요가 없어져 굉장히 편하게 플레이가 가능하며 생존자가 압도적으로 유리할 수 밖에 없습니다.
그리고 그렇게 상황판단 실력없이 다인큐빨로 랭크가 올라간 유저들이 솔큐를 돌릴 때면 같은 방에 잡힌 실력있는 솔큐 유저들은 고통받을 수 밖에 없겠죠. 이러한 고질적인 딜레마가 있습니다.
또한 이 게임 특성상 다인큐로 인해 밸런스 딜레마가 생깁니다.
생존자 4명이 각자 솔큐일 때를 기준으로 밸런스를 맞추면 다인큐4명일 때는 압도적으로 생존자가 유리합니다. 그렇다고 다인큐4명을 기준으로 밸런스를 맞추면 솔큐4명일 때는 압도적으로 생존자가 불리합니다. 거기다 생존자보다 살인마 플레이시 멘탈이 쉽게 피로해지기 때문에 만족감보다 압박감을 더 받기 쉽습니다.
다인큐로 인한 생존자 밸런스 뿐만이 아니라, 살인마간의 밸런스와 퍽과 애드온의 밸런스도 심하게 깨져있어 고랭크로 갈수록 좋다고 정평이 난 것들 몇개 빼고는 안쓰는 것이 정신건강에 좋습니다. 굳이 사용하려면 좋은 에드온과 실력으로 커버가 어느정도 가능하나 힘듭니다. 꾸준히 신캐릭터와 신규퍽이 나오고 간간히 퍽 밸런스 패치를 하지만, 그때마다 개발진이 얼마나 이 게임의 이해도가 딸리고 밸런스에 관심이 없는지 알 수 있습니다. 심지어 개발진측에서 모든 살인마의 밸런스를 맞출 필요를 느끼지 못한다고 했답니다.
또한 생존자와 살인마 모두 캐릭터마다 고유의 티처블퍽이 존재해 마음에 드는 퍽으로 조합하여 장착하려면 신전(신전은 매번 랜덤이기 때문에 자신이 원하는 퍽이 언제나올지 알 수 없어서 하염없이 기다려야 합니다.)에서 사지않는 이상은 여러캐릭터를 DLC로 구매해야하며, 일정 레벨까지는 필수로 키워야 합니다.
개인의 실력과 판단도 중요하지만 고랭크로 갈수록 좋은 퍽과 아이템,오퍼링의 희귀도와 사용유무가 게임의 흐름을 크게 좌우합니다.

#평소에 하드난이도 게임을 즐겨한다해도 추천하지않습니다. 이거 돈주고 할바에 유튜브나 보면서 대리만족이나 느끼고, 차라리 치킨사먹던지, 옷을 사 입으세요.

Nervenkitzel, Spannung und ein "Mörder"-Spaß! Dead by Daylight ist einfach ein Hammer! Ein Kollege von mir ist darauf aufmerksam geworden und er freute sich schon wie ein kleines Kind auf das Release des Spiels. Ich kaufte es mir dann auch gleich, obwohl ich ja schon einige Bedenken hatte, ob es das Richtige für mich sei.
Ich bin eigentlich eher der Schisser und mag Horrorspiele nicht so.
Aber weit gefehlt! 
Für den Anfang haben wir zu zweit in einer privaten Lobby gespielt, um ein Gefühl für die Handhabung zu bekommen und ob das Spiel auch wirklich so toll ist, wie es den Eindruck gemacht hatte.
Und ja, es hielt, was er versprach.
Es hat einen Riesenspaß gemacht, sei es als Killer oder Überlebender.
Als Überlebender, sobald der Killer einem zu Nahe kommt, der schneller werdende Herzschlag, die Geräusche um einen rum, die Quicktime Events beim Reparieren und Heilen bringen einem den Puls schon richtig in Fahrt.
Als Killer der Nervenkitzel, umherzustreifen und das nächste Opfer zu suchen, es zu finden und zuzuschlagen, dann geht es nach dem Schlag doch nicht wieder so schnell, wie man gerne hätte, muss den Spuren erst wieder folgen...
Alles Faktoren, die das Spiel NIE langweilig werden lassen, zumal jeder einzelne immer anders reagiert als die andern Mitspieler davor.
Wenn die Spielemacher sich jetzt noch einige neue Killer einfallen lassen und evtl. noch andere Möglichkeiten, die Opfer zu quälen, dann wird Dead by Daylight mit ziemlicher Sicherheit ein Spiel, dass jeder haben will!
Interessant wäre auch noch, dass man als Killer wenigstens einen Freund zu sich in die öffentliche Lobby einladen könnte, oder dass man evtl. sowas wie eine Serverliste erstellt, damit man als Überlebender mit einem oder mehreren Freunden gemeinsam in die gleiche Lobby einsteigen kann.

FAZIT: Ein Horrorspiel, das Nervenkitzel pur bietet, gepaart mit super viel Spaß!

Loving this game. The devs are really incredible and open to opinions from the community. On the last patch notes thread someone asked for them to explain them better and the devs were asking how they could make it better. Now off to the game itself.

Pros:
Great devs!
Incredibly fun.
Intense clutch moments where you either make an insane play or get outplayed. These make for some great times and are tense just like clutching on CS:GO!
So much depth on the build you take and especially the perks.
Can't win without working on the objective, promoting teamwork.
No voice or text chat. Having chat for survivors would make it incredibly unfair for the killer, which is also the reason why friends can't team up vs a solo survivor in Quick Play Games. Also no blaming each other.
Balanced.

Cons:

There are some bugs which are getting tackled by the dev team (from queue bugs to in game bugs).
There are infinite loops in which the Killer can never catch the Survivor (single) however there was made a huge improvement on this. There are still some infinite loops but most of them were removed. Can be frustrating at times.
The game is hosted by the killer, if they lagg everyone laggs in game.


All in all I love playing the game and the people watching me on stream love spectating me play the game. You can watch me play live at: twitch.tv/toongames. I'm also giving a copy away soon. ^_^

You cannot join a party with a friend or few more. Has to be done by a private party but if I have 2 other mates wanting to play a private party is not what I want to do. The only method is to try join a lobby at the same time as ur friend which is stupid.

I do not recommend this game to anyone who is wanting to play with friends as it is so difficult to attempt to join them online. 

Anyone who wants to play solo this is a good game for you.

However as they did not inform the consumer before purchase about not having a join a friend feature it is really pissed me off and has now ended up to recieve a bad review.
